statements: SELECT id, username, message, sentiment_score, timestamp FROM social_media_monitoring ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM social_media_monitoring WHERE id = 2
SELECT username, message FROM social_media_monitoring WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, message FROM social_media_monitoring WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT id, username FROM social_media_monitoring ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM social_media_monitoring WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, message FROM social_media_monitoring WHERE username LIKE 'J%' AND LENGTH(message) > 100 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, message, timestamp FROM social_media_monitoring WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, username, message, sentiment_score FROM social_media_monitoring WHERE message LIKE '%excited%' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT username) AS total_unique_users, AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score FROM social_media_monitoring WHERE sentiment_score IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, post_content FROM customers JOIN social_media_posts ON customers.customer_id = social_media_posts.customer_id ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_id, post_content FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, post_content FROM customers c JOIN social_media_posts p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM social_media_profiles WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT platform, COUNT(*) FROM social_media_profiles GROUP BY platform;
SELECT * FROM social_media_profiles WHERE handle LIKE 'John%';
SELECT template_text FROM response_templates WHERE platform = 'Facebook';
SELECT * FROM social_media_profiles WHERE platform='Instagram'
SELECT * FROM social_media_profiles WHERE handle LIKE '%John%'
SELECT handle, platform FROM social_media_profiles WHERE profile_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT template_text FROM response_templates WHERE platform='Twitter' ORDER BY template_id DESC

SELECT handle, interaction_date FROM social_media_profiles JOIN customer_interactions ON social_media_profiles.profile_id = customer_interactions.profile_id WHERE interaction_date>'2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts;
SELECT account_id, username, platform FROM social_media_accounts WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT username, followers_count FROM social_media_accounts ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE account_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, request_content FROM customer_requests WHERE request_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT account_id, username, platform FROM social_media_accounts WHERE platform = 'Instagram';
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE account_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT request_content, request_date FROM customer_requests WHERE LENGTH(request_content) > 50;
SELECT response_content, response_date FROM responses WHERE request_id = 3 ORDER BY response_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, social_media_handles FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT * FROM conversations WHERE start_datetime > '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_tickets FROM tickets GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_tickets > 5
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT conversation_id, start_datetime, end_datetime FROM conversations ORDER BY start_datetime DESC;
SELECT message_id, sender, message_text FROM messages WHERE sender IN ('Customer A', 'Customer B') AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT ticket_id, status, priority FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY priority DESC;
